channel.title: NotResolved on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in NotResolved on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: Unable to set the fill color for markup polygon
item.description: Details Overview when drawing a markup polygon with styles other than solid, the fill color would be black constantly in the viewer no matter what color you set. Solution This is expected behavior. Unfortunately changing the color for the ‘Fill Style’ other than ‘Solid’ is not supported by ESRI’s Javascript API. https://developers.arcgis.com/javascript/3/jsapi/simplefillsymbol-amd.html The ‘color’ property under the ‘Property Details’ states that this only applies with the SimpleFillSymbol.style = ‘STYLE_SOLID’.

item.title: Long Feature Description Missing
item.description: Information Details Overview In GVH 2.9, when only setting the Feature Long Descritpion, then performing identify operation would get description missing. For example: . However, when configuring the Feature Descrtipion and Feature Long Description at the same time, it would get the expected result as below shows: . This issue also raising in GVH 2.8.x Solution It would be fixed in GVH2.9.1
